title: Highly Selective Catalytic Oxidation of Methane to Methanol using Cu-Pd/Anatase
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02671C, Paper
Liqun Wang, Jingting Jin, Wenzhi Li, Cunshuo Li, Leyu Zhu, Zheng Zhou, Lulu Zhang, Xia Zhang, Liang Yuan
Direct conversion of methane into high value-added products is of great practical significance. The synergistic effect in catalysts with dual-active components show potential to increase the methanol yield and selectivity....
